1.text: Review the basics of strings, notes, and frets briefly if you're new to guitar.

2.text: Place your ring finger on the 5th string, 3rd fret.
2.vid: /d/d1/Play the C Major Chord on Guitar Step 2 Version 4.360p.mp4

3.text: Place your middle finger on the 4th string, 2nd fret.
3.vid: /5/54/Play the C Major Chord on Guitar Step 3 Version 4.360p.mp4

4.text: Place your index finger on the 2nd string, 1st fret.
4.vid: /8/80/Play the C Major Chord on Guitar Step 4 Version 4.360p.mp4

5.vid: /2/26/Play the C Major Chord on Guitar Step 5 Version 4.360p.mp4

6.text: Try the alternate fingerings for a richer open chord.
6.vid: /3/30/Play the C Major Chord on Guitar Step 6 Version 4.360p.mp4

7.text: Focus on getting your fingers as close to the fret as possible.

8.text: Move up to the 3rd fret for a higher-pitched C-major.

9.text: Use your index finger to bar the third fret for a C-major barre chord.

10.text: Move up to the eighth fret for another C-major barre chord.
